roleset.name: to discuss or argue about
roleset.note: DEBATE-V NOTES: Member of VNcls correspond-36.1-1-1, meet-36.3-2, chit_chat-37.6. Updated by Julia, 12/2010. (from debate.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: The Diet does n't normally even debate bills because the opposition parties are so often opposed to whatever LDP does that it would be a waste of time .
example.arg: because the opposition parties are so often opposed to whatever LDP does that it would be a waste of time

example.name: meged debators
example.text: Sherman and Martha debate on foreign policy all the time

example.name: all args
example.text: Senator Rodam-Clinton will debate Governor Pataki on budget cuts

example.name: autogen1
example.text: the debate within France 's military establishment over theRafale , which is made by Avions Marcel Dassault-Breguet AviationSA
example.arg: over the Rafale , which is made by Avions Marcel Dassault-BreguetAviation SA

roleset.name: able to be argued
roleset.note: DEBATABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6. Relation to debate.01. (from debatable.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: The account of the facts for whether it is a crime or not may be debatable , but the crime is absolutely not deserving of death , is it ... ?!
example.arg: The account of the facts for whether it is a crime or not
